item.title: SMF Question: Minimum Karma
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Karma is split between good and bad karma. The final result is good + bad, where bad is always negative. If I understand how the system works exactly, there is no round number stored for overall karma. The reason that code won’t work is because good karma should always be positive period.

I would say find the place where the bad karma is dealt with, then make sure its absolute value is never less than the good karma. I might be wrong about the whole good + bad thing, but I’m fairly confident it’s correct. Moparisthebest should be able to correct me here. He’s done a lot more with the karma system than I have.
